scripts.db:dev:local: dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c "prisma db push && prisma db seed"
scripts.db:dev:local:reset: dotenv -e .env.local -- sh -c "prisma db push --force-reset && prisma db seed"
scripts.db:preview:local: dotenv -e .env.preview.local -- sh -c "prisma db push && prisma db seed"
scripts.db:preview:local:reset: dotenv -e .env.preview.local -- sh -c "prisma db push --force-reset && prisma db seed"
scripts.preview:local: dotenv -e .env.preview.local -- sh -c "prisma generate && next build && next start -p 3001"
scripts.db:preview: dotenv -e .env.preview -- sh -c "prisma db push && prisma db seed"
scripts.db:preview:reset: dotenv -e .env.preview -- sh -c "prisma db push --force-reset && prisma db seed"
